prefix_walkthrough:
!!! Here is a walkthrough of a text game:

==>STEP NUM: 0
==>ACT: Init
==>OBSERVATION: Pig lost! Boss say that it Grunk fault. Say Grunk forget about closing gate. Maybe boss right. Grunk not remember forgetting, but maybe Grunk just forget. Boss say Grunk go find pig, bring it back. Him say, if Grunk not bring back pig, not bring back Grunk either. Grunk like working at pig farm, so now Grunk need find pig.

Lost Pig
And Place Under Ground
Release 2 / Serial number 080406 / Inform v6.30 6/11 / ZCODE-1-070917-994E
(For help, use "HELP".)

Outside
Grunk think that pig probably go this way. It hard to tell at night time, because moon not bright as sun. There forest to east and north. It even darker there, and Grunk hear lots of strange animal. West of Grunk, there big field with little stone wall. Farm back to south.


==>STEP NUM: 1
==>ACT: examine me
==>OBSERVATION: Grunk orc. Big and green and wearing pants.


==>STEP NUM: 2
==>ACT: inventory
==>OBSERVATION: Grunk have:
  torch (on fire)
  pants (Grunk wearing them)


==>STEP NUM: 3
==>ACT: examine farm
==>OBSERVATION: Farm where Grunk work. Grunk take care of pigs. Good job, but farmer get mad when Grunk eat pig.


==>STEP NUM: 4
==>ACT: examine forest
==>OBSERVATION: Many tree and bush and leaf and branch and other plant like that. That what forest mean. It dark, too. Pig probably some place in there, but Grunk not know which way to go.


==>STEP NUM: 5
==>ACT: look for pig
==>OBSERVATION: Grunk look all around for any thing that moving or hiding.

Grunk hear noise! It come from some place in bushes, but Grunk not sure which way it come from.


==>STEP NUM: 6
==>ACT: listen
==>OBSERVATION: Grunk get quiet. Listen for noise in dark.

There, hear noise again! It come from northeast. Must be pig, hiding in bushes.

[Grunk score go up one.]


==>STEP NUM: 7
==>ACT: northeast
==>OBSERVATION: If that where pig go, that where Grunk go. It hard to see where Grunk going to, because there so much dark and leaves and branches here. Then suddenly, there not ground here any more!

Oof! Ow! Umf! Ugh!

Grunk fall down deep hole! Drop torch. Torch go out when Grunk land on it, so now it dark, too.

Hole
Grunk at bottom of deep, dark hole. It even smell like deep, dark hole. There some light that come from tunnel to east; that how Grunk see where Grunk at. Look like there maybe stairs at west side of hole that go up to outside, but them all broken now. There big crack in ground near stairs, too.

Grunk see torch (black and sooty) here.


==>STEP NUM: 8
==>ACT: examine stairs
==>OBSERVATION: That where Grunk fall down into hole. Stair go up pretty high. Made of rock, but rock all falling apart, so stair not much good for climbing anymore.

Look like some person leave little metal thing on step.


==>STEP NUM: 9
==>ACT: examine metal thing
==>OBSERVATION: Look like little metal tube, size of Grunk thumb.


==>STEP NUM: 10
==>ACT: take tube and torch
==>OBSERVATION: tube: OK, got it.
torch: OK, got it.


==>STEP NUM: 11
==>ACT: look inside tube
==>OBSERVATION: There little flat bit inside of tube.


==>STEP NUM: 12
==>ACT: blow in tube
==>OBSERVATION: Tweeeeeeeeeeee!


==>STEP NUM: 13
==>ACT: examine crack
==>OBSERVATION: Crack wide as Grunk fist, at least at top. It dark, so Grunk not see if anything there inside or how deep crack go.


==>STEP NUM: 14
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: Fountain Room
All wall in this room glow! It bright, just like day time. Except that instead of sun, it wall that glow. And instead of grass and tree, it square room with four wall. And instead of outside, it all under ground. But beside those thing, it just like it! Tunnel keep going out to east and west, but normal doorway go north and southeast and southwest.

In middle of room, there fountain. But fountain not have any water.

South wall have big curtain hanging on it.

Hey! There pig! It good thing that Grunk fall down same hole as pig.


==>STEP NUM: 15
==>ACT: examine pig
==>OBSERVATION: Pig pink and chubby. Look tasty. But Grunk meet this pig before, on farm. Grunk know that this pig quick. And smart.

Pig look back at Grunk.


==>STEP NUM: 16
==>ACT: follow pig
==>OBSERVATION: Pig right here!


==>STEP NUM: 17
==>ACT: catch it
==>OBSERVATION: Grunk walk right up to pig. Pig walk right away from Grunk.


==>STEP NUM: 18
==>ACT: examine fountain
==>OBSERVATION: Old stone fountain with big bowl part and other squirty part in middle and lots of little bit that stick out all over. Grunk think it meant to look pretty. Squirty part not work, though, so there no water in it.

Pig try climbing inside fountain. But pig not good at climbing.


==>STEP NUM: 19
==>ACT: examine bowl
==>OBSERVATION: Fountain bowl really big. Too big for fruit or for gruel or for soup. That lot of soup. Mmm, soup.

Hey, there coin inside fountain bowl! Grunk keep coin, because coin handy thing.

Pig peek over at fountain bowl too.

[Grunk score go up one.]


==>STEP NUM: 20
==>ACT: examine coin
==>OBSERVATION: Coin little and shiny, like moon. It look old, but it still mostly shiny grey.


==>STEP NUM: 21
==>ACT: examine curtain
==>OBSERVATION: Look like big rug, but it on wall instead of floor, so that make it curtain instead. Curtain have big picture of little man on it. Grunk think little man maybe called "gnome". Him holding burning torch in dark cave. Point at way out of cave.

Pig try climbing inside fountain. But pig not good at climbing.


==>STEP NUM: 22
==>ACT: examine man
==>OBSERVATION: Gnome in picture have round nose and big ear and funny blue suit and pointy shoe. Hold torch, too.


==>STEP NUM: 23
==>ACT: north
==>OBSERVATION: Pig see Grunk leave. But not seem to care much.

Statue Room
This room have two big picture that face each other. West wall have picture on it and east wall have different picture on it. Grunk think both picture really just part of wall, though. South wall have doorway in it that lots of light come from and north wall not have anything in it at all.

Statue of little man stand here, up on big stone block.


==>STEP NUM: 24
==>ACT: examine west mural
==>OBSERVATION: Picture have big pile of black powder. Powder all on fire. Picture have bucket of water, too. Bucket pouring water onto fire. Grunk guess that water for making fire go out.


==>STEP NUM: 25
==>ACT: examine east mural
==>OBSERVATION: Picture have long purple pole that go from side to side. All around pole, there different yellow thing that float in air, like sun and tabby cat and thing that Grunk never see before and lots of other thing too. Under that, there picture of pie. Mmm, pie.


==>STEP NUM: 26
==>ACT: examine statue
==>OBSERVATION: Statue look like little man with round nose and big ear and moustache. Grunk think funny little man maybe called "gnome". Wear funny suit and pointy shoe and little round hat. One hand point north, at wall. Other hand up in air.

Gnome stand on big stone block. Maybe block for making gnome look tall. It true that statue look more big than real gnome, but Grunk think that just because it statue. Maybe all thing look more big when it like rock.


==>STEP NUM: 27
==>ACT: examine hat
==>OBSERVATION: Hat look like round little bowl with brim. But upside down.

Hmm. Hat look little bit crooked.


==>STEP NUM: 28
==>ACT: take it
==>OBSERVATION: Hat come right off! Grunk guess it not really part of statue after all.


==>STEP NUM: 29
==>ACT: wear it
==>OBSERVATION: OK, Grunk put on hat.


==>STEP NUM: 30
==>ACT: south
==>OBSERVATION: Fountain Room
All wall in this room glow. It bright, just like day time. Except that instead of sun, it wall that glow. And instead of grass and tree, it square room with four wall. And instead of outside, it all under ground. But beside those thing, it just like it! Tunnel keep going out to east and west, but normal doorway go north and southeast and southwest.

In middle of room, there fountain. But fountain not have any water.

South wall have big curtain hanging on it.

Pig here too.


==>STEP NUM: 31
==>ACT: southwest
==>OBSERVATION: Pig look happy that Grunk going away.

Table Room
This room look like it maybe for eating or for play cards or for maybe for just sitting and talking. That because there big table and one chair here. There no lamp or thing like that in room, but lots of light come from northeast doorway. Other doorway go east.

There tall metal box over in corner.

Look like some person come in and make marks on wall here.

Chair next to table look lonely with no other chair.


==>STEP NUM: 32
==>ACT: examine box
==>OBSERVATION: Box almost tall as Grunk. It have little slot near top, and it have bigger basket down near bottom, and it have lever that stick out of side of box. It have some dent in it too, so maybe it old.


==>STEP NUM: 33
==>ACT: put coin in slot
==>OBSERVATION: Clink! Coin gone inside box now.


==>STEP NUM: 34
==>ACT: pull lever
==>OBSERVATION: KA-CHUNK! Thunk! Brick fall out of box into basket.


==>STEP NUM: 35
==>ACT: examine brick
==>OBSERVATION: Brick light brown and not too big. There lots of little colored thing stuck in it all over.


==>STEP NUM: 36
==>ACT: take it
==>OBSERVATION: Brick feel more soft than normal brick. Little bit sticky too.


==>STEP NUM: 37
==>ACT: smell it
==>OBSERVATION: Mmm, fruity.


==>STEP NUM: 38
==>ACT: taste it
==>OBSERVATION: Yum! Brick taste sweet and crumbly and chewy and fruity. Not bad. Munch munch. Only half left now.


==>STEP NUM: 39
==>ACT: eat it
==>OBSERVATION: Not bad. Munch munch. All gone!

Already? But Grunk more hungry than before!


==>STEP NUM: 40
==>ACT: examine dent
==>OBSERVATION: Look like box maybe lose fight.


==>STEP NUM: 41
==>ACT: hit box
==>OBSERVATION: BAM! Clink! Coin fall out of box into basket.


==>STEP NUM: 42
==>ACT: take coin
==>OBSERVATION: OK, got it.


==>STEP NUM: 43
==>ACT: put coin in slot
==>OBSERVATION: Clink! Coin gone inside box now.


==>STEP NUM: 44
==>ACT: pull lever
==>OBSERVATION: KA-CHUNK! Thunk! Brick fall out of box into basket.


==>STEP NUM: 45
==>ACT: hit box
==>OBSERVATION: BAM! Clink! Coin fall out of box into basket.


==>STEP NUM: 46
==>ACT: take all from basket
==>OBSERVATION: coin: OK, got it.
brick: OK, got it.


==>STEP NUM: 47
==>ACT: put coin in slot
==>OBSERVATION: Clink! Coin gone inside box now.

Grunk remember what happen next!

KA-CHUNK! Thunk! Brick fall out of box into basket.

WHAM! Clink! Coin fall out of box into basket.


==>STEP NUM: 48
==>ACT: take all from basket
==>OBSERVATION: coin: OK, got it.
brick: OK, got it.


==>STEP NUM: 49
==>ACT: examine chair
==>OBSERVATION: Wood chair. Look like it just right size for sitting at big table.


==>STEP NUM: 50
==>ACT: take it
==>OBSERVATION: OK, got it.


==>STEP NUM: 51
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: Closet
It dark. Grunk see lots of shadow. Grunk see doorway to east and west, too. But mostly shadow.

Chhhkkkrrcht! What that strange noise?


==>STEP NUM: 52
==>ACT: examine shadow
==>OBSERVATION: Shadow just dark, but in lots of different shape and size.

Shkkrnnnnk!


==>STEP NUM: 53
==>ACT: listen
==>OBSERVATION: Sound like snoring.

Kzzkzzzkzzzzk!


==>STEP NUM: 54
==>ACT: shout
==>OBSERVATION: RAAARRRR!

Strange noise stop. Then voice shout, "Ztorf!"

Room light up! Grunk see little bed and trunk and desk and little man in bed. Light come from blue ball that sit on desk. Little man climb out of bed and put on pair of pointy slipper. Him walk over and squint at Grunk. "Huh," him say. "An orc."

Grunk say that Grunk orc. Then little man (Grunk think him called "gnome") pull out little stool from desk and sit down.

"Well, Grunk," him say, "What do you want?"


==>STEP NUM: 55
==>ACT: greet gnome
==>OBSERVATION: Grunk say hello to gnome.

Gnome nod at Grunk.

Gnome search around inside desk drawer for little bit, until him give up.

[Grunk can try TELL GNOME ABOUT GRUNK or ASK GNOME ABOUT GNOME or ASK GNOME ABOUT THIS PLACE. And that just what Grunk think of. There probably lots of other thing Grunk can talk about too.]


==>STEP NUM: 56
==>ACT: tell gnome about grunk
==>OBSERVATION: Grunk tell gnome all about Grunk and about farm and about boss and about pig.

"Mmm," gnome say. "I see. That's quite the formidable quest you're on there. But I'm sure you're up to it."

Gnome go over to trunk and open it up. Him start searching in there.

[Grunk can try TELL GNOME ABOUT PIG or TELL GNOME ABOUT FARM or ASK GNOME ABOUT GNOME or ASK GNOME ABOUT THIS PLACE. And probably lots of other thing too.]


==>STEP NUM: 57
==>ACT: ask gnome about statue
==>OBSERVATION: Grunk ask gnome about statue.

Gnome say, "The statue at the north end of the shrine is of the alchemist this place was built for. It's not a bad likeness, if you ask me. Except for that silly hat."

Gnome shake head and close trunk. Then him look under bed.

[Grunk can try SHOW HAT TO GNOME or ASK GNOME ABOUT ALCHEMIST or TELL GNOME ABOUT PIG or TELL GNOME ABOUT FARM or ASK GNOME ABOUT GNOME or ASK GNOME ABOUT THIS PLACE. And probably lots of other thing too.]


==>STEP NUM: 58
==>ACT: ask what gnome looking for
==>OBSERVATION: Grunk ask what gnome looking for.

Gnome sigh. "There's a reference text that I was planning to do some research with today." Him look quick around room. "Mogglev's Shocking Forces. But I have no idea where it's gone."

Gnome peek up on shelf. Then him look under desk. Then him look around at room.

[Grunk can try ASK GNOME ABOUT MOGGLEV or SHOW HAT TO GNOME or ASK GNOME ABOUT ALCHEMIST or TELL GNOME ABOUT PIG or TELL GNOME ABOUT FARM or ASK GNOME ABOUT GNOME or ASK GNOME ABOUT THIS PLACE. And probably lots of other thing too.]


==>STEP NUM: 59
==>ACT: look under bed
==>OBSERVATION: There nothing at all under bed. Not even book.

Gnome ask, "Find anything new?"


==>STEP NUM: 60
==>ACT: talk to gnome about mogglev
==>OBSERVATION: Grunk ask gnome what "Mogglev" all about.

Gnome say, "Birrabee Mogglev sem Alua dec Prestim was one of the finest alchemists of his generation. He was a student of the fundamental forces, such as motion and charge. It was from his groundwork that--" Sound like gnome stutter there. "That Zugilbor Galrogginpots derived his principles of thermomechanics."

"His Shocking Force is considered the definitive text on the force of lightning to this day."

Gnome sigh. "Well, it's gone. I can't find my copy of Mogglev's The Shocking Force anywhere."

Gnome go back to desk and sit down.

"I don't even know how long it's been missing," him say. "It's probably in the hands of that last band of looters now."

[Grunk can try ASK GNOME ABOUT LIGHTNING or SHOW HAT TO GNOME or ASK GNOME ABOUT THERMOMECHANICS or ASK GNOME ABOUT ALCHEMIST or TELL GNOME ABOUT PIG or TELL GNOME ABOUT FARM or ASK GNOME ABOUT GNOME or ASK GNOME ABOUT THIS PLACE. And probably lots of other thing too.]

[Maybe that too many. TOPICS OFF mean that Grunk not keep thinking up idea for talking about every time.]


==>STEP NUM: 61
==>ACT: look
==>OBSERVATION: Gnome Room
This look like room for little person. It have bed that too little for Grunk. It have trunk that too little for Grunk. It have desk that too little for Grunk. Desk have stool that too little for Grunk. Room have doorway to east and west too, but them not so little. That good, because if doorway too little for Grunk, not know how Grunk get back out of room.

Gnome sitting on stool looking at Grunk.

On top of shelf there ball (that make light).

Gnome open up desk drawer and take out strange helmet. Him take out little box, too. Then him put them both on desk.


==>STEP NUM: 62
==>ACT: look under bed
==>OBSERVATION: There nothing at all under bed. Not even book.

Gnome open up little box. It full of lots of little metal thing with different shape. Look like them some kind of tool.


==>STEP NUM: 63
==>ACT: open trunk
==>OBSERVATION: That all locked up.

Gnome pick out strange pinchy thing.


==>STEP NUM: 64
==>ACT: examine ball
==>OBSERVATION: Ball glow bright blue. It size of Grunk fist and very round.


==>STEP NUM: 65
==>ACT: take ball
==>OBSERVATION: Gnome shake head at Grunk. "I don't see why I should just let you take my things. It's not as though you've done anything in particular to earn them."

Gnome stare at helmet, thinking. Tap him chin with tool.

"Ow!" gnome say with surprise.


==>STEP NUM: 66
==>ACT: show torch to gnome
==>OBSERVATION: Grunk tell gnome all about torch that Grunk bring.

Gnome say, "It's always a good idea to bring a light source along when you go exploring. It's a shame yours has gone out. If only you had some means of making a fire."

Gnome poke tool into hole in helmet, and part of helmet light up.

"Aha!" gnome say.

[Grunk can try ASK GNOME ABOUT LIGHTNING or SHOW HAT TO GNOME or ASK GNOME ABOUT THERMOMECHANICS or ASK GNOME ABOUT ALCHEMIST or ASK GNOME ABOUT MAKING FIRE or TELL GNOME ABOUT PIG or TELL GNOME ABOUT FARM or ASK GNOME ABOUT GNOME or ASK GNOME ABOUT THIS PLACE. And probably lots of other thing too.]


==>STEP NUM: 67
==>ACT: ask gnome about fire
==>OBSERVATION: Grunk ask gnome how Grunk can make fire.

"There are many different ways to make fire," Gnome say. "You can use flint and steel, if you have them. They say you can rub two pieces of wood together, but I've never had much luck with that." Then gnome say, "Or you could just use alchemy. But whichever you use, be careful not to make a mess with all that soot and ash."

Gnome put tool back in box.

[Grunk can try ASK GNOME ABOUT LIGHTNING or SHOW HAT TO GNOME or ASK GNOME ABOUT FLINT AND STEEL or ASK GNOME ABOUT THERMOMECHANICS or ASK GNOME ABOUT ALCHEMY or ASK GNOME ABOUT ALCHEMIST or ASK GNOME ABOUT WOOD or TELL GNOME ABOUT PIG or TELL GNOME ABOUT FARM or ASK GNOME ABOUT GNOME or ASK GNOME ABOUT THIS PLACE. And probably lots of other thing too.]


==>STEP NUM: 68
==>ACT: show brick to gnome
==>OBSERVATION: Grunk tell gnome all about this brick that Grunk find.

"Well!" say gnome, "Just like mother used to make. Those things are surprisingly addictive." Gnome point finger at Grunk. "It's hard to stop at just one."

Gnome pick tool with glowy bit at end.

[Grunk can try ASK GNOME ABOUT LIGHTNING or SHOW HAT TO GNOME or ASK GNOME ABOUT FLINT AND STEEL or ASK GNOME ABOUT THERMOMECHANICS or ASK GNOME ABOUT ALCHEMY or ASK GNOME ABOUT ALCHEMIST or ASK GNOME ABOUT WOOD or TELL GNOME ABOUT PIG or TELL GNOME ABOUT FARM or ASK GNOME ABOUT GNOME or ASK GNOME ABOUT THIS PLACE. And probably lots of other thing too.]


==>STEP NUM: 69
==>ACT: ask gnome about mother
==>OBSERVATION: Grunk tell gnome about Grunk mother and father and Grunk brother in army. Then Grunk ask if gnome have mother and father and brother too.

Gnome nod to Grunk. "I did have a mother and father, at one time. Torel Endali dec Jurandip sem Ulassinore and Bempiddle Frebensalbibit sem Oggropondo dec Lumin. Two more wonderful people you couldn't hope to meet. But they've both passed on, many years ago."

That sad that gnome mother and father gone. But it good that them good mother and father.

Gnome blow on tool. Then blow on helmet.

And probably lots of other thing too.]


==>STEP NUM: 70
==>ACT: east
==>OBSERVATION: Shelf Room
There lots of shelfs in this room. Them on every wall. This room probably have lots and lots of thing in it before. But shelfs all empty now. Grunk not see any thing there at all. Maybe Grunk see more if Grunk have torch that on fire. But probably not, because lots of light come from northwest doorway. There doorway to west too.

There stone chest at back of room.

Long green pole lean against wall next to doorway.
